name: WHITE Communications GmbH
description:
WHITE is a leading independent communications agency for international, premium, & luxury brands. 
Our core units are Public Relation/Influencer Network, Classic and Digital Media Consulting & Programmatic Media Buying, Brand Communication Consultancy, and a Studio for Creative Services.
We have more than 25 years of experience in developing tailor made strategies for our clients. WHITE offers unique and efficient marketing communication over all traditional and digital channels and disciplines.
